description: INSTALLATION OF TWO REFRIGERATION GAS COOLERS AND TWO AIR SOURCE HEAT PUMPS ON THE ROOF LEVEL CAR PARK.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - Commencement of development (Full Permission) - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - Approved Plans - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 
Proposed Site Plan
ZZ-DR-A-PL12 REV B
ZZ-DR-A-PL13 REV B
ZZ-DR-A-PL14 REV A

RF-DR-A-PL15 REV B
RF-DR-A-PL11 REVB

Condition : 3 - Due to potential impact on the surrounding locality from the development the noise criteria and mitigation recommendations to protect noise impact on the noise sensitive properties as specified in the NSL, Plant Noise Impact Assessment, dated 21 March 2024 Report reference: 91705/NIA shall be implemented and maintained as a minimum standard.

Condition : 4 - Materials as Specified - The facing materials to be used for the development hereby permitted shall be those specified in the application form and approved drawings unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - INFORMATIVE
In accordance with paragraph 38 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:

   i) Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
   ii) Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
   iii) As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.

In this instance:

   i) The applicant/agent was provided with pre-application advice.
   ii) The application was acceptable as submitted and no further assistance was required.
   iii) The application was approved without delay.
   iv) The application was considered by the Planning Committee where the applicant/agent had the opportunity to speak to the committee and promote the application.
